content: I'm about to go fishing for 36 hours. I'm hoping to get a new build of everything out before I leave, and an R4B set of fixes posted. But nothing will happen while I'm gone
no. release failed. I have a cascade of work waiting on a new validator release, and we can't get it out due to some issue on the maven servers.
@David Otasek is working on the release, but all the cascaded stuff will have to wait till I get back
